alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:58AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD...WEST CENTRAL NEW HAVEN AND CENTRAL WESTCHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM EDT... At 458 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near New Canaan, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Stamford, Norwalk, Shelton, New Canaan, Newtown, Fairfield, Stratford, Trumbull, Westport, Ridgefield, Monroe, Wilton, Seymour, and Derby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield
